messages.title: VOTE FOR CHANGE IN BRITAIN
messages.content: It’s been a privilege to live in and serve this wonderful area of West Oxfordshire. Constituency work is at the heart of what I do. With your support I would like to continue working on your behalf.

messages.title: This is a big moment for Britain
messages.content: But this is an election with a difference. I’m not just standing to become Witney’s Member of Parliament, but also to be your Prime Minister.

messages.title: A vote for change
messages.content: A vote for anyone else could leave us stuck with this failed Labour Government and the uncertainty of a hung Parliament which could kill the economic recovery.

messages.title: We need decisive leadership and new ideas
messages.content: We need decisive leadership and new ideas and energy to put this country back on its feet. So I hope you will join me and together we can build a better country.

issues.economy: A vote for anyone else could leave us stuck with this failed Labour Government and the uncertainty of a hung Parliament which could kill the economic recovery.
issues.governance: This is a big moment for Britain and one thing is clear: people are desperate for change – change only the Conservatives can guarantee.

leaflet.personalStatement: It’s been a privilege to live in and serve this wonderful area of West Oxfordshire. Constituency work is at the heart of what I do. With your support I would like to continue working on your behalf.

politicalExperience.achievements: Constituency work is at the heart of what I do.

images.caption: VOTE FOR CHANGE IN BRITAIN ON THURSDAY

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet promotes change, emphasizes the importance of decisive leadership, and suggests that voting for the candidate’s party is the only guarantee for change from the status quo of a failed Labour Government.
